trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_TODO_00<tab>Use the brown liquid at the designated locations and slay any robber rats that attack.
TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_GERBERT_000_000<tab>Well, you don't <var 1A 02 /var>look<var 1A 01 /var> like a Garlean... Assuming I'm correct, could you help me deal with a little pest problem?

TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_GERBERT_000_001<tab>Ever since the Empire outlawed the practice of all religions, I've been unable to pray at Hidden Tear. Instead, I decided to create a spot to the southwest where I could mourn the dead in secret.
TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_GERBERT_000_002<tab>The problem is, whenever I leave offerings of food for the deceased, those blasted robber rats gobble them up for themselves. That is why I have created this.
TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_GERBERT_000_003<tab>One whiff of it and those pests will be on their way. Though, make sure to be on your guard─some of the more aggressive rats may attack you instead.
TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_GERBERT_000_010<tab>One whiff of that liquid and those pests will be on their way. Though, make sure to be on your guard─some of the more aggressive rats may attack you instead.
TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_GERBERT_000_020<tab>The rats are all gone? Excellent news. Now I can speak with my son again.

TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_GERBERT_000_021<tab>I lost my boy to a quarrying accident some time ago. He pushed me out of the way when a bunch of rocks suddenly fell down on us. He was buried so deep we never even found his body...
TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_GERBERT_000_022<tab>I couldn't stand the idea of him being forgotten, so I went ahead and built a grave for him. It's near the area where the accident happened.
TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_GERBERT_000_023<tab>Not a day goes by when I don't wish he had saved himself. He still had his whole life ahead of him...
TEXT_STMBDZ103_02653_GERBERT_000_024<tab>Thank you for all of your help. It brings me some solace to know that I can still talk with my son from time to time.
